name: Are You Lucky with Love?
description:
Are You Lucky with Love is an online Twine game that centers on inclusivity and explores meaningful connections in 2023. After the user inputs their preferred name, gender, and sexual orientation, their morality is tested in a series of player-based situations. Once the instructions are read, the participant chooses their “cupid” sidekick to guide them through the dating process. Then, they meet their potential matches from four active contestants – Maeve, Evelyn, Jay, and Atticus - and decide who they want to become acquainted with. Guided by their host, the player will write their own story with the series of choices made.

Music from #Uppbeat (free for Creators!):

https://uppbeat.io/t/giulio-fazio/honey-im-home

License code: QXPGTARYVBYLXNZS
